title: Personal Net-Zero Calculator
para1: Calculate how many acres you, your family, your corporation, or your school must invest in to reach a net-zero emissions target
emissionsPlaceholder: Carbon footprint in tonnes per year
emissionsRegion: What region do you live in?
emissionsTimeHeader: How long do you want to be carbon neutral? (Years)
dataDisclaimer: This is an estimate of your average carbon footprint per year.
nextPara: Calculate how many acres of Smart Forest you need to invest in to reach a Net-Zero emissions target.
otherbox1Para: Calculate how much carbon your corporation must offset to reach net-zero.
otherbox2Para: Calculate how much carbon your school must offset to reach net-zero.
otherbox3Para: Calculate how much carbon you must personally offset to reach net-zero.
sharePersonalFacebook: I’m going #netNEGATIVE with @CanadasForest Trust to mitigate my impact on the climate. I’m doing my part, are you?
sharePersonalLinkedIn: Research shows that forests are the most effective way to sequester carbon and mitigate climate change. @CanadasForestTrust has created a unique opportunity for me to offset my impact. How? By building or being part of a communal Smart Forest. Calculate your #carbon footprint and get growing.
sharePersonalTwitter: I’ve calculated my #carbon footprint and am growing it to #netZERO with @CanadasForest Trust. I’m doing my part, are you?
sharePersonalEmailBody: Did you know that forests are one of the most effective ways to sequester carbon and mitigate climate change? The research is clear and the need to combat our climate deficit is pressing. Canada’s Forest Trust has created a unique opportunity for me to offset my impact. How? By building or being part of a communal Smart Forest. Calculate your carbon footprint and get growing.
shareSchoolFacebook: With the help of @CanadasForest Trust, [school name] has calculated our #carbon footprint. Click the link below to: 1) Calculate your carbon footprint 2) Start building your forest 3) Save the planet 4) Start a school fundraiser 5) Protect our future by growing to net-zero
shareSchoolLinkedIn: With the help of @CanadasForest Trust, [school name] has calculated our #carbon footprint. We are committed to: 1) Growing to net-zero 2) Saving our planet 3) Motivating our student body to become environmental stewards 4) Fundraising for our school 5) Protecting the planet and our future by growing to net-zero. Are you? Click the link below to start calculating your school's carbon footprint. #CanadasForestTrust #CFT #SmartForests #EcoSchools #SmartForests
shareSchoolTwitter: With the help of @CanadasForest Trust, we’ve calculated our net-ZERO journey. But, that’s not enough. So, we’re growing to be net-negative! Are you?
shareSchoolEmailSubject: Join us in growing to net-zero
shareSchoolEmailBody: The research is clear. An issue as threatening as climate change needs a solution as smart as forests. Click the link below to help mitigate climate change.
shareCorpFacebook: [Company name] takes our ESG seriously. When it comes to climate, having a balanced and long-term approach is non-negotiable. Using @CanadasForest Trusts proprietary calculator, we are building our Smart Forests to grow to net-zero. Click the link below to help mitigate climate change.
shareCorpLinkedIn: [Company name] has committed to plant it forward to take bold action against climate change. How? We’re growing to be net-NEGATIVE with @CanadasForestTrust. Learn how you can become net-negative with #CFT. #CanadasForestTrust #SmartForests #ClimateChange
shareCorpTwitter: When it comes to climate, having a balanced and long-term approach is non-negotiable. Using @CanadasForest Trusts proprietary calculator, we are on our way to net-zero. Are you?
shareCorpEmailSubject: It’s time to grow to net-zero
shareCorpEmailBody: When it comes to climate, having a balanced and long-term approach is non-negotiable. Using Canada’s Forest Trusts proprietary Carbon, net-ZERO and net-NEGATIVE Calculators, we are building Smart Forests to achieve our ESG goals and become net-ZERO. Are you?
